F2.name: F2
F2.description: Root namespace of the F2 SDK

F2.App.name: F2.App
F2.App.description:
The App Class is an optional class that can be namespaced onto the 
{{#crossLink "F2\Apps"}}{{/crossLink}} namespace.  The 
[F2 Docs](../../app-development.html#app-class)
has more information on the usage of the App Class.

params.name: appConfig
params.description: The F2.AppConfig object for the app

params.name: root
params.description: The root DOM Element for the app

F2.AppConfig.name: F2.AppConfig
F2.AppConfig.description: The AppConfig object represents an app's meta data

F2.AppManifest.name: F2.AppManifest
F2.AppManifest.description: The assets needed to render an app on the page

F2.ContainerConfig.name: F2.ContainerConfig
F2.ContainerConfig.description:
An object containing configuration information for the
[container](../../container-development.html)

F2.ContainerConfig.UI.name: F2.ContainerConfig.UI
F2.ContainerConfig.UI.description: An object containing configuration defaults for F2.UI

F2.ContainerConfig.UI.Mask.name: F2.ContainerConfig.UI.Mask
F2.ContainerConfig.UI.Mask.description:
An object containing configuration defaults for the 
F2.UI.{{#crossLink "F2.UI/showMask"}}{{/crossLink}} and
F2.UI.{{#crossLink "F2.UI/hideMask"}}{{/crossLink}} methods.

F2.Constants.name: F2.Constants
F2.Constants.description: Constants used throughout the Open Financial Framework

F2.Constants.Sockets.name: F2.Constants.Sockets
F2.Constants.Sockets.description: Constants for use with cross-domain sockets

F2.Constants.Views.name: F2.Constants.Views
F2.Constants.Views.description:
The available view types to apps. The view should be specified by applying
the {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Css"}}{{/crossLink}}.APP\_VIEW class to the
containing DOM Element. A DATA\_ATTRIBUTE attribute should be added to the
Element as well which defines what view type is represented.
The `hide` class can be applied to views that should be hidden by default.

F2.Events.name: F2.Events
F2.Events.description:
Handles [Context](../../app-development.html#context) passing from
containers to apps and apps to apps.

F2.Rpc.name: F2.Rpc
F2.Rpc.description: Handles socket communication between the container and secure apps

F2.UI.Modals.name: F2.UI.Modals
F2.UI.Modals.description: Helper methods for creating and using Modals

F2.UI.Views.name: F2.UI.Views
F2.UI.Views.description: Helper methods for creating and using Views

classitems.description:
A function to pass into F2.stringify which will prevent circular
reference errors when serializing objects
classitems.name: appConfigReplacer

classitems.description:
The apps namespace is a place for app developers to put the javascript
class that is used to initialize their app. The javascript classes should
be namepaced with the {{#crossLink "F2.AppConfig"}}{{/crossLink}}.appId. 
It is recommended that the code be placed in a closure to help keep the
global namespace clean.

If the class has an 'init' function, that function will be called 
automatically by F2.
classitems.name: Apps

classitems.description:
Creates a namespace on F2 and copies the contents of an object into
that namespace optionally overwriting existing properties.
classitems.name: extend

params.name: ns
params.description:
The namespace to create. Pass a falsy value to 
add properties to the F2 namespace directly.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to copy into the namespace.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: True if object properties should be overwritten

classitems.description: Generates a somewhat random id
classitems.name: guid

classitems.description: Search for a value within an array.
classitems.name: inArray

return.description: True if the item is in the array

classitems.description: Wrapper logging function.
classitems.name: log

classitems.description: Wrapper to convert a JSON string to an object
classitems.name: parse

classitems.description:
Wrapper to convert an object to JSON

**Note: When using F2.stringify on an F2.AppConfig object, it is
recommended to pass F2.appConfigReplacer as the replacer function in
order to prevent circular serialization errors.**
classitems.name: stringify

params.name: replacer
params.description:
An optional parameter that determines
how object values are stringified for objects. It can be a function or an 
array of strings.

params.name: space
params.description:
An optional parameter that specifies the
indentation of nested structures. If it is omitted, the text will be
packed without extra whitespace. If it is a number, it will specify the
number of spaces to indent at each level. If it is a string (such as '\t'
or ' '), it contains the characters used to indent at each level.

classitems.description: Function to get the F2 version number
classitems.name: version

classitems.description: Class stubs for documentation purposes

An optional init function that will automatically be called when
F2.{{#crossLink "F2\registerApps"}}{{/crossLink}} is called.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description:
The unique ID of the app. More information can be found
[here](../../app-development.html#f2-appid)
classitems.name: appId

classitems.description: An object that represents the context of an app
classitems.name: context

classitems.description: True if the app should be requested in a single request with other apps.
classitems.name: enableBatchRequests

classitems.description:
The height of the app. The initial height will be pulled from
the {{#crossLink "F2.AppConfig"}}{{/crossLink}} object, but later
modified by calling
F2.UI.{{#crossLink "F2.UI/updateHeight"}}{{/crossLink}}. This is used
for secure apps to be able to set the initial height of the iframe.
classitems.name: height

classitems.description:
The unique runtime ID of the app.

**This property is populated during the
F2.{{#crossLink "F2/registerApps"}}{{/crossLink}} process**
classitems.name: instanceId

classitems.description:
True if the app will be loaded in an iframe. This property
will be true if the {{#crossLink "F2.AppConfig"}}{{/crossLink}} object
sets isSecure = true. It will also be true if the
[container](../../container-development.html) has made the decision to
run apps in iframes.
classitems.name: isSecure

classitems.description:
The url to retrieve the {{#crossLink "F2.AppManifest"}}{{/crossLink}}
object.
classitems.name: manifestUrl

classitems.description:
The recommended maximum width in pixels that this app should be run.
**It is up to the [container](../../container-development.html) to
implement the logic to prevent an app from being run when the maxWidth
requirements are not met.**
classitems.name: maxWidth

classitems.description:
The recommended minimum grid size that this app should be run. This
value corresponds to the 12-grid system that is used by the
[container](../../container-development.html). This property should be
set by apps that require a certain number of columns in their layout.
classitems.name: minGridSize

classitems.description:
The recommended minimum width in pixels that this app should be run. **It
is up to the [container](../../container-development.html) to implement
the logic to prevent an app from being run when the minWidth requirements
are not met.
classitems.name: minWidth

classitems.description: The name of the app
classitems.name: name

classitems.description:
The root DOM element that contains the app

**This property is populated during the
F2.{{#crossLink "F2/registerApps"}}{{/crossLink}} process**
classitems.name: root

classitems.description:
The instance of F2.UI providing easy access to F2.UI methods

**This property is populated during the
F2.{{#crossLink "F2/registerApps"}}{{/crossLink}} process**
classitems.name: ui

classitems.description:
The views that this app supports. Available views
are defined in {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}. The
presence of a view can be checked via
F2.{{#crossLink "F2/inArray"}}{{/crossLink}}:

    F2.inArray(F2.Constants.Views.SETTINGS, app.views)
classitems.name: views

classitems.description:
The array of {{#crossLink "F2.AppManifest.AppContent"}}{{/crossLink}}
objects
classitems.name: apps

classitems.description: Any inline javascript tha should initially be run
classitems.name: inlineScripts

classitems.description: Urls to javascript files required by the app
classitems.name: scripts

classitems.description: Urls to CSS files required by the app
classitems.name: styles

classitems.description: Arbitrary data to be passed along with the app
classitems.name: data

classitems.description: The string of HTML representing the app
classitems.name: html

classitems.description: A status message
classitems.name: status

classitems.description:
Allows the [container](../../container-development.html) to override how
an app's html is inserted into the page. The function should accept an
{{#crossLink "F2.AppConfig"}}{{/crossLink}} object and also a string of
html
classitems.name: afterAppRender

params.name: html
params.description: The string of html representing the app

return.description: The DOM Element surrounding the app

classitems.description:
Allows the [container](../../container-development.html) to wrap an app
in extra html. The function should accept an
{{#crossLink "F2.AppConfig"}}{{/crossLink}} object and also a string of
html. The extra html can provide links to edit app settings and remove an
app from the container. See
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Css"}}{{/crossLink}} for CSS classes that
should be applied to elements.
classitems.name: appRender

params.name: html
params.description: The string of html representing the app

classitems.description:
Allows the container to render html for an app before the AppManifest for
an app has loaded. This can be useful if the design calls for loading
icons to appear for each app before each app is loaded and rendered to
the page.
classitems.name: beforeAppRender

return.description: The DOM Element surrounding the app

classitems.description:
Tells the container that it is currently running within
a secure app page
classitems.name: isSecureAppPage

classitems.description: The backround color of the overlay
classitems.name: backgroundColor

classitems.description: The path to the loading icon
classitems.name: loadingIcon

classitems.description: The opacity of the background overlay
classitems.name: opacity

classitems.description:
Do not use inline styles for mask functinality. Instead classes will
be applied to the elements and it is up to the container provider to
implement the class definitions.
classitems.name: useClasses

classitems.description: The z-index to use for the overlay
classitems.name: zIndex

classitems.description:
Allows the container to specify which page is used when
loading a secure app. The page must reside on a different domain than the
container
classitems.name: secureAppPagePath

classitems.description:
Specifies what views a container will provide buttons
or links to. Generally, the views will be switched via buttons or links
in the app's header.
classitems.name: supportedViews

classitems.description:
The APP class should be applied to the DOM Element that surrounds the
entire app, including any extra html that surrounds the APP\_CONTAINER
that is inserted by the container. See the 
{{#crossLink "F2.ContainerConfig"}}{{/crossLink}} object.
classitems.name: APP

classitems.description:
The APP\_CONTAINER class should be applied to the outermost DOM Element
of the app.
classitems.name: APP_CONTAINER

classitems.description:
The APP\_TITLE class should be applied to the DOM Element that contains
the title for an app.  If this class is not present, then
F2.UI.{{#crossLink "F2.UI/setTitle"}}{{/crossLink}} will not function.
classitems.name: APP_TITLE

classitems.description:
The APP\_VIEW class should be applied to the DOM Element that contains
a view for an app. The DOM Element should also have a
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}.DATA_ATTRIBUTE
attribute that specifies which
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}} it is.
classitems.name: APP_VIEW

classitems.description:
APP\_VIEW\_TRIGGER class should be applied to the DOM Elements that
trigger an
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Events"}}{{/crossLink}}.APP\_VIEW\_CHANGE
event. The DOM Element should also have a
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}.DATA_ATTRIBUTE
attribute that specifies which
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}} it will trigger.
classitems.name: APP_VIEW_TRIGGER

classitems.description:
The MASK class is applied to the overlay element that is created
when the F2.UI.{{#crossLink "F2.UI/showMask"}}{{/crossLink}} method is
fired.
classitems.name: MASK

classitems.description:
The MASK_CONTAINER class is applied to the Element that is passed into
the F2.UI.{{#crossLink "F2.UI/showMask"}}{{/crossLink}} method.
classitems.name: MASK_CONTAINER

classitems.description:
The APP\_SYMBOL\_CHANGE event is fired when the symbol is changed in an
app. It is up to the app developer to fire this event.
Returns an object with the symbol and company name:

    { symbol: 'MSFT', name: 'Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ)' }
classitems.name: APP_SYMBOL_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The APP\_WIDTH\_CHANGE event will be fired by the container when the
width of an app is changed. The app's instanceId should be concatenated
to this constant.
Returns an object with the gridSize and width in pixels:

    { gridSize:8, width:620 }
classitems.name: APP_WIDTH_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The CONTAINER\_SYMBOL\_CHANGE event is fired when the symbol is changed
at the container level. This event should only be fired by the
container or container provider.
Returns an object with the symbol and company name:

    { symbol: 'MSFT', name: 'Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ)' }
classitems.name: CONTAINER_SYMBOL_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The CONTAINER\_WIDTH\_CHANGE event will be fired by the container when
the width of the container has changed.
classitems.name: CONTAINER_WIDTH_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The EVENT message is sent whenever
F2.Events.{{#crossLink "F2.Events/emit"}}{{/crossLink}} is fired
classitems.name: EVENT

classitems.description:
The LOAD message is sent when an iframe socket initially loads.
Returns a JSON string that represents:

    [ App, AppManifest]
classitems.name: LOAD

classitems.description:
The RPC message is sent when a method is passed up from within a secure
app page.
classitems.name: RPC

classitems.description:
The RPC\_CALLBACK message is sent when a call back from an RPC method is
fired.
classitems.name: RPC_CALLBACK

classitems.description: The UI\_RPC message is sent when a UI method called.
classitems.name: UI_RPC

classitems.description:
The DATA_ATTRIBUTE should be placed on the DOM Element that contains the
view.
classitems.name: DATA_ATTRIBUTE

classitems.description: The ABOUT view gives details about the app.
classitems.name: ABOUT

classitems.description: The HELP view provides users with help information for using an app.
classitems.name: HELP

classitems.description:
The HOME view is the main view for an app. This view should always
be provided by an app.
classitems.name: HOME

classitems.description:
The REMOVE view is a special view that handles the removal of an app
from the container.
classitems.name: REMOVE

classitems.description:
The SETTINGS view provides users the ability to modify advanced settings
for an app.
classitems.name: SETTINGS

classitems.description: Appends the app's html to the DOM
classitems.name: _afterAppRender

return.description: The DOM Element that contains the app

classitems.description: Renders the html for an app.
classitems.name: _appRender

classitems.description:
Rendering hook to allow containers to render some html prior to an app
loading
classitems.name: _beforeAppRender

return.description: The DOM Element surrounding the app

classitems.description: Adds properties to the AppConfig object
classitems.name: _hydrateAppConfig

classitems.description: Attach app events
classitems.name: _initAppEvents

classitems.description: Attach container Events
classitems.name: _initContainerEvents

classitems.description: Has the container been init?
classitems.name: _isInit

return.description: True if the container has been init

classitems.description: Loads the app's html/css/javascript
classitems.name: loadApp

classitems.description: Loads the app's html/css/javascript into an iframe
classitems.name: loadSecureApp

params.name: appManifest
params.description:
The app's html/css/js to be loaded into the
page.

classitems.description: Checks if the app is valid
classitems.name: _validateApp

return.description: True if the app is valid

classitems.description: Gets the current list of apps in the container
classitems.name: getContainerState

return.description: An array of objects containing the appId

classitems.description:
Initializes the container. This method must be called before performing
any other actions in the container.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Has the container been init?
classitems.name: isInit

return.description: True if the container has been init

classitems.description:
Begins the loading process for all apps. The app will
be passed the {{#crossLink "F2.AppConfig"}}{{/crossLink}} object which will
contain the app's unique instanceId within the container. Optionally, the
{{#crossLink "F2.AppManifest"}}{{/crossLink}} can be passed in and those
assets will be used instead of making a request.
classitems.name: registerApps

params.name: appManifests
params.description:
An array of
{{#crossLink "F2.AppManifest"}}{{/crossLink}}
objects. This array must be the same length as the apps array that is
objects. This array must be the same length as the apps array that is
passed in. This can be useful if apps are loaded on the server-side and
passed down to the client.

classitems.description: Removes all apps from the container
classitems.name: removeAllApps

classitems.description: Removes an app from the container
classitems.name: removeApp

classitems.description:
Same as F2.Events.emit except that it will not send the event
to all sockets.
classitems.name: _socketEmit

classitems.description:
Execute each of the listeners that may be listening for the specified
event name in order with the list of arguments.
classitems.name: emit

classitems.description:
Adds a listener that will execute n times for the event before being 
removed. The listener is invoked only the first time the event is 
fired, after which it is removed.
classitems.name: many

params.name: timesToListen
params.description:
The number of times to execute the event
before being removed

params.name: listener
params.description:
The function to be fired when the event is
emitted

classitems.description: Remove a listener for the specified event.
classitems.name: off

params.name: listener
params.description: The function that will be removed

classitems.description: Adds a listener for the specified event
classitems.name: on

params.name: listener
params.description:
The function to be fired when the event is
emitted

classitems.description:
Adds a one time listener for the event. The listener is invoked only
the first time the event is fired, after which it is removed.
classitems.name: once

params.name: listener
params.description:
The function to be fired when the event is
emitted

classitems.description: Creates a socket connection from the app to the container using easyXDM.
classitems.name: _createAppToContainerSocket

classitems.description: Creates a socket connection from the container to the app using easyXDM.
classitems.name: _createContainerToAppSocket

return.description: A function to make the RPC call

classitems.description: Handles messages that come across the sockets
classitems.name: _onMessage

classitems.description: Registers a callback function
classitems.name: _registerCallback

classitems.description: Broadcast an RPC function to all sockets
classitems.name: broadcast

classitems.description: Calls a remote function
classitems.name: call

params.name: functionName
params.description: The name of the remote function

params.name: params
params.description:
An array of parameters to pass to the remote
function. Any functions found within the params will be treated as a
callback function.

classitems.name: init

classitems.description:
Determines whether the Instance ID is considered to be 'remote'. This is
determined by checking if 1) the app has an open socket and 2) whether
F2.Rpc is running inside of an iframe
classitems.name: isRemote

return.description: True if there is an open socket

classitems.description: Creates a container-to-app or app-to-container socket for communication
classitems.name: register

classitems.description: Removes a overlay from an Element on the page
classitems.name: hideMask

params.name: selector
params.description:
The Element or selector to an Element
that currently contains the loader

classitems.description: Display an alert message on the page
classitems.name: alert

params.name: callback
params.description:
The callback to be fired when the user
closes the dialog

classitems.description: Display a confirm message on the page
classitems.name: confirm

params.name: okCallback
params.description:
The function that will be called when the OK
button is pressed

params.name: cancelCallback
params.description:
The function that will be called when
the Cancel button is pressed

classitems.description:
Sets the title of the app as shown in the browser. Depending on the
container HTML, this method may do nothing if the container has not been
configured properly or else the container provider does not allow Title's
to be set.
classitems.name: setTitle

classitems.description: Display an ovarlay over an Element on the page
classitems.name: showMask

params.name: selector
params.description:
The Element or selector to an Element
over which to display the loader

classitems.description:
For secure apps, this method updates the size of the iframe that
contains the app. **Note: It is recommended that app developers call
this method anytime Elements are added or removed from the DOM**
classitems.name: updateHeight

classitems.description: Change the current view for the app or add an event listener
classitems.name: change

params.name: input
params.description:
If a string is passed in, the view
will be changed for the app. If a function is passed in, a change
event listener will be added.

classitems.description: Removes a view event listener
classitems.name: off

params.name: listener
params.description: The function that will be removed

classitems.description: Adds a view event listener
classitems.name: on

params.name: listener
params.description:
The function to be fired when the event is
emitted

classitems.description: Removes a overlay from an Element on the page
classitems.name: hideMask

params.name: instanceId
params.description: The Instance ID of the app

params.name: selector
params.description:
The Element or selector to an Element
that currently contains the loader

classitems.description: Display an ovarlay over an Element on the page
classitems.name: showMask

params.name: instanceId
params.description: The Instance ID of the app

params.name: selector
params.description:
The Element or selector to an Element
over which to display the loader
